issues.title: Complete Remaining General Commands
issues.body:
## Category: General Commands

This issue tracks the final 3 unimplemented commands in the General Commands category.

**Progress Update (Nov 8):** All 117 functions are complete! 50 of 107 commands implemented (46.7%). Only 57 commands remain.

### Remaining Commands to Implement (3 items)

- [ ] `@DECOMPILE` - Decompile object attributes for inspection
- [ ] `@EDIT` - Edit attribute values interactively
- [ ] `@GREP` - Search for patterns across attributes

### Implementation Requirements

1. **Implementation**: Each command must be fully implemented according to PennMUSH specifications
2. **Unit Tests**: Include comprehensive unit tests with:
   - Test cases using actual/expected values
   - Unique test strings for easy comparison (e.g., "test_string_DECOMPILE_case1")
   - Edge case testing (invalid arguments, permissions, etc.)
3. **Documentation**: Update help files if needed
4. **Compatibility**: Ensure PennMUSH compatibility where applicable

### File Location
Commands are located in: `SharpMUSH.Implementation/Commands/GeneralCommands.cs`

### Testing Guidelines
- Use descriptive test names: `Test_CommandName_Scenario`
- Include unique identifiable strings in test data
- Test both success and failure cases
- Validate error messages and return values

### Context
These are high-value commands commonly used for debugging and development.

**Priority: HIGH**

issues.title: Implement Remaining Administrative & Gameplay Commands
issues.body:
## Category: Administrative & Gameplay Commands

This issue tracks the remaining 54 unimplemented commands across administrative and gameplay categories.

**Progress Update (Nov 8):** 74.6% of all features complete. 6 commands implemented since Nov 6.

### Remaining Commands to Implement (54 items)

#### Administrative Commands (34 items)
- [ ] `@ALLHALT`, `@ALLQUOTA`, `@BOOT`, `@CHOWNALL`, `@CHZONEALL`, `@CLOCK`
- [ ] `@DBCK`, `@DISABLE`, `@DUMP`, `@ENABLE`, `@HOOK`, `@KICK`
- [ ] `@LIST`, `@LOG`, `@LOGWIPE`, `@LSET`, `@MALIAS`, `@MOTD`
- [ ] `@POLL`, `@POOR`, `@PURGE`, `@QUOTA`, `@READCACHE`, `@REJECTMOTD`
- [ ] `@SHUTDOWN`, `@SITELOCK`, `@SLAVE`, `@SOCKSET`, `@SQUOTA`, `@SUGGEST`
- [ ] `@UNRECYCLE`, `@WARNINGS`, `@WCHECK`, `@WIZMOTD`

#### Gameplay Commands (20 items)
- [ ] `BRIEF`, `BUY`, `DESERT`, `DISMISS`, `DOING`, `EMPTY`, `FOLLOW`
- [ ] `GET`, `GIVE`, `HOME`, `INVENTORY`, `LEAVE`, `SCORE`, `SESSION`
- [ ] `TEACH`, `UNFOLLOW`, `USE`, `WARN_ON_MISSING`, `WHISPER`, `WITH`

### Phased Implementation Recommended

**Phase 1: Core Administrative (10-12 commands)**
- @SHUTDOWN, @DUMP, @KICK, @BOOT - Server management
- @QUOTA, @PURGE - Resource management
- @LOG, @LOGWIPE - Logging
- @DISABLE, @ENABLE - Feature management

**Phase 2: Essential Gameplay (8-10 commands)**
- GET, INVENTORY, GIVE - Object manipulation
- HOME, LEAVE - Movement
- DOING, SESSION - Status
- WHISPER - Communication

**Phase 3: Advanced Administrative (Remaining)**
- Extended administrative commands
- Advanced gameplay commands

### Implementation Requirements

1. **Implementation**: Each command according to PennMUSH specifications
2. **Unit Tests**: Comprehensive tests with unique strings
3. **Documentation**: Update help files
4. **Compatibility**: PennMUSH parity verification

### File Location
Commands are located in: `SharpMUSH.Implementation/Commands/`

### Total Remaining: 54 commands
**Current Completion: 74.6% overall (167/224 features)**
